summary: a realistic spider and frostbite spider texture overhaul
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][/color][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Arachnophobia [/color]- Spider Tex[/size][/size][size=4][size=5] ([i]Araneus diadematus[/i])
[size=3][i]A realistic spider and frostbite spider texture overhaul
[/i][/size][/size][/size][size=3][i]



[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i]The little spider on my window brought me the idea for this mod. [/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Araneus_diadematus]Araneus diadematus[/url]﻿[/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i]

[color=#666666]The spider species Araneus diadematus is commonly called the European garden spider,
diadem spider, cross spider and crowned orb weaver. It is sometimes called the pumpkin spider,
although this name is also used for a different species, Araneus marmoreus.
It is an orb-weaver spider found in Europe and North America.[/color]
[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3][i](Screenshots 1k & 4k)[/i][/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][color=#cc4125][size=3][i][i][size=3][i][size=3]

[/size][/i][/size][/i][/i][/size][/color][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i][/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.
Simple, for free . . .[/color]

[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][i][size=3]You like it ?   Do not forget to endorsed me.
[/size][/i]My mod link:  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/11889623?tab=about+me]clauDA[/url]  -[i][size=3][i][size=3] new update[/size][/i][/size][/i]

Dear animal rights activists.

Sorry for the blood in the screenshots.
This is not the blood of the spider but my blood.
I heroically approached the beast to take these photos.
I assure you, they are still alive.    (-; [/color]
